titles.title: To designate Homestead Air Force Base, Florida, and the county within which the military installation is located, as an enterprise zone for purposes of title VII of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1987.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Growth and Credit Formation.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 5/6/1993--Introduced. Designates Homestead Air Force Base, Florida, and a specified portion of Dade County, Florida, as an additional enterprise zone for purposes of title VII of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1987.
